titleStmt.title: To all the faithful servants of Jesus Christ, especially to such as labour in the word and doctrine, through England and Wales.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Commissioners for Approbation of Public Preachers.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by T.R. and E.M. for Ralph Smith, at the Bible in Cornhill, near the Royal Exchange.,

notesStmt.note: A circular of the Commissioners for approbation of publick preachers, signed at end: Signed in the name, and at the request of the Commissioners for approbation of publick preachers, by Francis Rous. John Arrowsmith. William Goffe. Stephen Marshall.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the Bible in Cornhill, near the Royal Exchange.
